content.description:
This route is right of

Parade Rest

.  It has a gently overhanging, tight hands and rattly fingers crux at the beginning.  It eases up to some 5.9 near the top.  Metolius rap bolts are located to the right of the crack at the top.  This is a classic that doesn't see the crowds.  It is worth the hike, since you can combine this,

Old Dog's New Trick

, and

Women's Work

for a killer Vedauwoo fingers shredding.

Parade Rest is a decent route, worth trying if you are in the area with one caveat....  Do you enjoy the Vedauwoo 'thrutch'?  If you are among this group, the climb is for you.  PR is among the lines at Vedauwoo that appear easy from a glance.  Climb off of the initial flake into the right facing offwidth start.  After gaining a shelf, surmount the upper handcrack.
content.protection: Rack up to at least 4 inches.

content.description:
This neoclassic gem the of 22nd century was first climbed on lead by the venerable C. Undergrast  Murray during pride month, 2017. This quality crack deserves to be repeated by those who feel

Soft Parade

too flacid. It is guaranteed to make any hardman much, much harder.
content.location:
This is on Parade Rock just right of

Soft Parade

.
